title: Here’s how much Apple is shelling out to the MLB for ‘Friday Night Baseball’
content:
Apple announced during its “Peek Performance” event that baseball is coming to the Apple TV+ with “Friday Night Baseball.” According to the company, subscribers will be able to watch a couple of Major League Baseball games every Friday. Now, a report indicates how much Apple had to shell out for this deal.

more…

The post Here’s how much Apple is shelling out to the MLB for ‘Friday Night Baseball’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to Apple, TV+ subscribers will be able to watch a couple of Major League Baseball games every week with "Friday Night Baseball."
